channel.title: Left 4 dead vs HL2 ep3
channel.description: Now this may have been talked about already on here (sorry if it has i just signed up) but i am curious as to how other half life enthusiasts feel about valve devoting seemingly all of there time to the Left 4 Dead series, releasing parts one and 2 less than 2 years apart and giving us absolutely NO WORD on ep3... I dont know about you guys but I really do not think Left 4 Dead is worthy of putting the half life episodes on hold... It is a decent game yes and we all know it can be GREAT training to spruce up some techniques for our zombie plans (which i hope you all have in order) and i do LOVE the dismemberment that is able to occur in Left 4 dead 2, but i feel like valve really is wasting their time on that series simply because it is a much easier game to produce and they can make quick money on it. Just my opinion, what do you guys think?

item.title: Left 4 dead vs HL2 ep3
item.dc:creator: Chrillen
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

you my dear friend, are not understanding that when I said Left 4 dead was better than half life, it was a troll post, hence the troll face.

It truly is amazing how hard it is to undo a successful troll.

Should’a just kept trollin’ man.

item.title: Left 4 dead vs HL2 ep3
item.dc:creator: Deadline99
item.description:
You my dear friend, have misinterpreted his post. Let me reword it for him.

“Might as well get out of these forums right now.”

means

“Why are you in a forum for a remake of Half Life if you believe that the company that originally created the game should give it up because it is not worth the time?”

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 dead vs HL2 ep3
item.dc:creator: RandomSpoon
item.description:
baconeggs:

Valve is a company, they divert resources to what will make them the most money. Because of this I fail to understand why so much time is being wasted on TF2 updates.

I don’t even need to check your steam page to know you don’t own TF2.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 dead vs HL2 ep3
item.dc:creator: D_Rae
item.description:
danielsangeo:

I believe that Valve can work on more than one game at a time. They were working on the Half Life 2: Episode 2 and released Portal and Team Fortress 2 in one fell swoop (Orange Box).

I wonder if they’ll release Left 4 Dead 3 with Half Life 2: Episode 3 and Portal 2 all in one package. They could call it “The OMFG Box”.

If they did that, i believe getting on my knees would be in order.

And i did not know they were made by separate teams, learn something new every day. haha I still say all resources for the time being should be directed at ep3 as i am still pissed about and cant get the last images of ep 2 out of my head…

Read full topic

help i have been expelled from the boner academy

So… that’s where you went on your out of country trip…

These things happen. Not to worry Nutsack: No doubt the gynecologist Society of Ninja midgets will gladly accept you. What fun! Just watch out for throwing stars and such.

item.title: Left 4 dead vs HL2 ep3
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Door:

The way Valve works means that they can continue work on Episode 3 while working on other projects; I don’t really mind that they’re making other games, it’s nice to see them working on something other than just Gordon Freeman and his Crowbar. If they only concentrated on that they would be brain dead within a few months and create generic games like other large games companies do.

They’d be like Bungie and IW, amirite?

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 dead vs HL2 ep3
item.dc:creator: D_Rae
item.description:
Now this may have been talked about already on here (sorry if it has i just signed up) but i am curious as to how other half life enthusiasts feel about valve devoting seemingly all of there time to the Left 4 Dead series, releasing parts one and 2 less than 2 years apart and giving us absolutely NO WORD on ep3… I dont know about you guys but I really do not think Left 4 Dead is worthy of putting the half life episodes on hold… It is a decent game yes and we all know it can be GREAT training to spruce up some techniques for our zombie plans (which i hope you all have in order) and i do LOVE the dismemberment that is able to occur in Left 4 dead 2, but i feel like valve really is wasting their time on that series simply because it is a much easier game to produce and they can make quick money on it. Just my opinion, what do you guys think?
